title: PIIGS
description:
(English CC)

PIIGS, narrated by Willem Dafoe, is a documentary that challenges prevalent European budgetary policies and the austerity dogma.


Austerity policies keep dividing the continent into winners and losers, creating a great amount of suffering in the process. Consequently, the whole European project has come into doubt.


Aided by the voices of prestigious international economists, left-wing intellectuals and experts, PIIGS argues that the origin of the European debt crisis is not the inadequacy of certain countries but the very foundation of the euro itself.


The documentary features Noam Chomsky, Stephanie Kelton, and Yanis Varoufakis among others.


Directed by: Adriano Cutraro, Federico Greco, & Mirko Melchiorre


Released in 2017
